body: The Magarena 1.44 zip file seems to be infected. Is it legit?
author: [jakub.mi...@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/110312501485361632225/)
title: Virus

comments.body:
The .jar files included can sometimes trigger an alert in some antivirus software as malware or trojans.

The link shows an analysis of the file https://www.virustotal.com/uk/file/20f42e7be5e7cd23f4cf59c9b4465847eda62dc6b671e781ec9108ebc71201e1/analysis/1387728833/
comments.author: [ShawnieBoyUK](https://code.google.com/u/ShawnieBoyUK/)

content:
_From [jakub.mi...@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/110312501485361632225/) on December 22, 2013 05:44:15_

The Magarena 1.44 zip file seems to be infected. Is it legit?
